    public class ChatActivity
extends PermissionActivity
implements HistoryMessageListener, IMMessageListener<ChatMessage>, OnRoomChatRecordListener<java.util.List<ChatMessage>>, OnChatRecordListener<java.util.List<ChatMessage>>, android.view.View.OnClickListener, MessageStateListener<ChatMessage>, RefreshViewListener<ChatMessage>, StopRefreshListener
    A simple Fragment subclass.
